steps.s4: Click 'Create Questionnaire' button to create questionnaires for the participants
steps.s5: Copy each participant link and share with them
steps.s8: Click 'Generate report' button and the animation with analytics will show up

steps.s1: Access the link provided by your administrator
steps.s2: Access the questionnaire shared by your administrator
steps.s3: Complete the questionnaire questions about your teammates / classmates
steps.s4: Send the results to your administrator
